job.title: Software Engineer: Frontend
job.description: stronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongWere looking for an engineer that is a passionate web developer but that also has the skills to expand out of that We are looking for someone who strives to go beyond what is possible in a web browser with strong design sensibilities and a desire to create interfaces that are a pleasure to usebrbrWhat youll dobrul liMaintains a zero policy for platform errors proactively discusses and syncs with CS on important issues to act fast and deploy fixesli liKeeps an eye for pixelperfect design on our web platform projectsli liKeep our product uptodate with the latest frontend technologies such as React and ES2016li liTake a significant role in building strong customerfocused experiences in our web projectsli liWork closely with the team to deliver features and product updates following our busy roadmap while adapting to the unpredictable constant impacts of customer requestsli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul liBe on the Eastern EST or at most 3 hours way PST since our team is located in NY Boston Colorado Mexico and Costa Rica and we want as much overlap for working hours as possibleli liConstantly maintains a good attitude towards making product changes and moving the needle week after weekli liHas previous engineering experience in building and scaling web apps that drive rich frontend experiencesli liAn engineer that in the face of uncertainty it thrives someone that is persistent and doesnt need specific instructions or guidance into solving problemsli liA skilled engineer in web technologies with a specialization in React and Reduxli liA person that keeps constantly updated with the latest Javascript libraries JS Patterns and web standards someone that has a taste for them and can recommend what is worth using or notli liHas a strong say about API Design knows well what would work best in different situations and is not afraid to look beyond web development to make or suggest any changes neededli brbrulstronguWhat Youll Love About UsbrbrustrongWe are a mighty customerdriven productfocused growing company filled with motivated people that join together from a variety of backgrounds and skillsets to push new ideas and projects to the finish line We are a fully remote team toobrbrustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liCompetitive salary li liHealth insuranceli liUnlimited vacation and paid company holidaysli liEarly stock option grants opportunityli liTeam bonding activities even in our remote worldsli liLaptop and other equipment fundamentals monitor keyboard and mouseli liEndless learning opportunitiesli brbrulstronguAbout PeelbrbrustrongPeel is an automated analytics platform for ecommerce businesses on Shopify We are a productfirst company who believes that the best teams operate when they are informed by data  lots of it so we are creating a more efficient extensive affordable way for companies to do itbrbrWe are a fully remote productdriven team reinventing the way eCommerce teams access and comprehend data analysis and are working to fulfill our vision to make data simple reliable and visually intuitive for everyone
